biotools.summary: SuperPose is a tool for superpositions of protein structures.  SuperPose generates sequence alignments, structure alignments, PDB coordinates and RMSD statistics, difference distance plots, and images of the superimposed molecules.

bioschemas.name: SuperPose
bioschemas.summary: SuperPose is a tool for superpositions of protein structures.  SuperPose generates sequence alignments, structure alignments, PDB coordinates and RMSD statistics, difference distance plots, and images of the superimposed molecules.
